title: Reckless Love
description: No one who roamed the steep green mountains and red-rock canyons of Utah Territory was safe from El Cascabel and his renegade warriors--not Janna Wayland, not the wild stallion, Lucifer--not even Ty MacKenzie, the stranger who had come for the stallion, and stayed to capture Janna's heart. Now all three must join forces and make their escape, or die trying. Reissue.
author: Elizabeth Lowell
